//

//   ----------------------- ----- ----

//   ScreenPositionScaleBias c1       1

//   ScreenToWorld           c15      4
//   ScreenToShadowMatrix    c19      4
//   LightPosition           c23      1
//   FalloffParameters       c24      1
//   SceneColorTexture       s0       1
//   NvStereoFixTexture      s1       1
//   ShadowDepthTexture      s2       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c4, 0.0625, 0, 9.99999975e-006, 100000
    def c5, 0.999000013, 1, 0, -1
    dcl_texcoord v0.xyw
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s13


// Unreal Engine stereo correction disabled by DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --only-autofixed --git --quiet CRC32_3DD70050_0.txt
def c3, 0, 0, 0, 0 // Overrides NvStereoEnabled passed from Unreal Engine

texldl r5, c220.z, s13
mov r6.xyw, v0
add r5.w, r6.w, -r5.y
mad r6.x, r5.w, r5.x, r6.x

    abs r0.x, c3.x
    if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
      texld r1, c4, s1
      add r0.y, -r1.y, r6.w
      mad r1.x, r1.x, r0.y, r6.x
      mov r1.yz, r6.xyww
    else
      mov r1.xyz, c4.y
    endif
    cmp r0.xyz, -r0.x, r6.xyww, r1
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.xy, r0.z, r0
    mad r0.xy, r0, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r0.zw, c4.y
    texldl r0, r0, s0
    add r0.x, r0.w, -c2.y
    add r0.y, -r0.x, c4.z
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    cmp r0.x, r0.y, c4.w, r0.x
    mul r0.x, r0.x, c2.x
    rcp r0.y, r6.w
    mul r0.yz, r0.y, r6.xxyw
    mul r0.yz, r0.x, r0
    mul r1, r0.z, c20

// Unreal Engine shadow fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --only-autofixed --git --quiet CRC32_3DD70050_0.txt
add r5.w, r0.x, -r5.y
mad r0.y, -r5.w, r5.x, r0.y

    mad r1, c19, r0.y, r1
    mad r1, c21, r0.x, r1
    add r1, r1, c22
    rcp r0.w, r1.w
    min r2.z, r1.z, c5.x
    mad_pp r3, r1.xyxy, r0.w, c7
    mad r2.xyw, r3.xyzx, c5.yyzz, c5.zzzy
    texldp_pp r4, r2, s2
    mad r2.xyw, r3.zwzx, c5.yyzz, c5.zzzy
    texldp r3, r2, s2
    add_pp r1.z, r3.x, r4.x
    mad_pp r3, r1.xyxy, r0.w, c8
    mov_pp r2.xy, r3
    texldp r4, r2, s2
    add_pp r1.z, r1.z, r4.x
    mov_pp r2.xy, r3.zwzw
    texldp r3, r2, s2
    add_pp r1.z, r1.z, r3.x
    mad_pp r3, r1.xyxy, r0.w, c9
    mov_pp r2.xy, r3
    texldp r4, r2, s2
    add_pp r1.z, r1.z, r4.x
    mov_pp r2.xy, r3.zwzw
    texldp r3, r2, s2
    add_pp r1.z, r1.z, r3.x
    mad_pp r3, r1.xyxy, r0.w, c10
    mov_pp r2.xy, r3
    texldp r4, r2, s2
    add_pp r1.z, r1.z, r4.x
    mov_pp r2.xy, r3.zwzw
    texldp r3, r2, s2
    add_pp r1.z, r1.z, r3.x
    mad_pp r3, r1.xyxy, r0.w, c11
    mov_pp r2.xy, r3
    texldp r4, r2, s2
    add_pp r1.z, r1.z, r4.x
    mov_pp r2.xy, r3.zwzw
    texldp r3, r2, s2
    add_pp r1.z, r1.z, r3.x
    mad_pp r3, r1.xyxy, r0.w, c12
    mov_pp r2.xy, r3
    texldp r4, r2, s2
    add_pp r1.z, r1.z, r4.x
    mov_pp r2.xy, r3.zwzw
    texldp r3, r2, s2
    add_pp r1.z, r1.z, r3.x
    mad_pp r3, r1.xyxy, r0.w, c13
    mov_pp r2.xy, r3
    texldp r4, r2, s2
    add_pp r1.z, r1.z, r4.x
    mov_pp r2.xy, r3.zwzw
    texldp r3, r2, s2
    add_pp r1.z, r1.z, r3.x
    mad_pp r3, r1.xyxy, r0.w, c14
    mov_pp r2.xy, r3
    texldp r4, r2, s2
    add_pp r0.w, r1.z, r4.x
    mov_pp r2.xy, r3.zwzw
    texldp r1, r2, s2
    add_pp r0.w, r0.w, r1.x
    mul_pp r0.w, r0.w, c4.x
    mul r1.xyz, r0.z, c16
    mad r1.xyz, c15, r0.y, r1
    mad r0.xyz, c17, r0.x, r1
    add r0.xyz, r0, c18
    add r0.xyz, -r0, c23
    mul r0.xyz, r0, c23.w
    dp3 r0.x, r0, r0
    rsq r0.x, r0.x
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    mad r0.x, r0.x, c24.y, c24.z
    max r1.x, r0.x, c4.y
    mad r0.x, r1.x, -r1.x, c5.y
    max r1.x, r0.x, c4.y
    pow_pp r0.x, r1.x, c24.x
    mov r1.w, c5.w
    add r1, r1.w, c0
    mad r1, r0.x, r1, c5.y
    mul r0.x, r0.w, r0.w
    add r2, -r1, c5.y
    mad oC0, r0.x, r2, r1

// approximately 110 instruction slots used (19 texture, 91 arithmetic)
